summary: A troubled man gets released from prison and starts taking out his sadistic fantasies on an unsuspecting family living in a secluded house.
cast: Erwin Leder|Robert Hunger-Bühler|Silvia Ryder|Karin Springer|Edith Rosset|Josefine Lakatha|Rudolf Götz|Kuba|Renate Kastelik|Hermann Groissenberger|Claudia Schinko|Beate Jurkowitsch|Rosa Schandl|Rolf Bock|Emil Polaczek|Helmut Hrdina|Adolf Hagmann|Karl Riepl|Gunther Dietz|Elisabeth Fez|Paula Elkins|Tennesee Gelinek|Valerian Tomisch|Rafael Gelinek|Mischa Griegor|Andrea Eckelbacher|Ursula Kretschier|Martin Kretschier|Tina Schlögl|Rudolf Steger|Walter Herzog
title: La angustia del miedo
